summary:
This mod basically adds my Skyrim Character as a follower.
He can be found in Four Shields Tavern.
descriptionHtml:
This mod basically adds my Skyrim Character as a follower.
He can be found in Four Shields Tavern.

He can instantly be added as a follower.
Supports the "Multiple Followers Lite" Mod from Steam Workshop.

If you don't like his armor or weapon, change it easily with the "I would like to Trade." chat option.

If you have any suggestions or bugs, tell me in the Comments Section.

This does not yet have Images, but it will soon.
author: Kiresz
